item.title: OSINT Start Point
item.author: Rich
item.description: Intro Most people often wonder where to start in their open source intelligence investigations, and rightfully so. There are a host of options to choose from when trying to search the web for intelligence based information on suspects and witnesses. Yes, the starting point should be a simple Google search for name, telephone number, username, etc. However, there are outside options that should be attempted if you come up dry during your initial search engine based attempts at locating information.
